basic_information.title: Basic Information
basic_information.domain_pattern_error: Domain must contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens

validation_rules.title: Validation Rules
validation_rules.content_filter_description: Automatically block inappropriate words like "dick", "vagina", etc.

payment_settings.title: Payment Settings
payment_settings.no_items: No whitelist items yet. Click "Add Item" to get started.

pricing_table.title: Pricing Table
pricing_table.description: Configure pricing for different tag lengths and subscription durations. Prices are in cents (e.g., 240 = $2.40).
pricing_table.pricing_info_2: • The "6-15" row applies to tag names with 6-15 characters
pricing_table.pricing_info_3: • Individual length rows (16-27) override the range pricing
pricing_table.pricing_info_4: • Changes are automatically saved when you update the form

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Monitor tag domain creation, subscriptions and activity metrics

tagDomainsOverview.subtitle: Number of tag domains created (free and premium)

activeTags.subtitle: Number of currently active tag domains

allTagsVsPaidTags.title: All Tags vs. Paid Tags
allTagsVsPaidTags.subtitle: Comparison between total and paid tag domains

conversionRate.title: Conversion Rate
conversionRate.description: Conversion rate shows the percentage of total tag registrations that convert to paid/premium tags. Higher is better.

premiumAdoption.title: Premium Adoption
premiumAdoption.description: Premium Adoption shows the percentage of users who upgrade to paid tag features. Higher indicates better monetization.

revenuePotential.title: Revenue Potential
revenuePotential.description: Revenue Potential shows the projected conversion rate based on current trends and user behavior patterns.
